channel.title: Quickscape -Amazing Runescape Private Server Advanced -Join now ! Searching staf
channel.description:
Website: http://quickscape667.weebly.com/ Play Now: http://www.mediafire.com/download/377x1oa1wkr84nn/QuickScapenNewAdventure.jar
[size=14pt]Server is currently Online Welcoming PLayers[/size]
Check the Pics Bellow Scroll
Credits :Poanizer
-Staff Hyperion ( Owner) Staff slots open
Features:
Pvm: -Nex -Corp -GWD (no killcount) -Tormented Demons -Evil Chickens -Steel Kiwi Boss -Nomad (Drops havnt been added) -DKS -Lucien -Ice titans -Sea Troll Queen
PvP: -Safe pvp -Clan wars (safe/dangerous) -Death Match Arena -Wilderness Pking
Skilling: -Semi low Rate (Non combat) -All skills avaliable -Max cape rewarded when maxed
Donatorzone: -Donator skilling zone -Skilling benefits -Donator Only Items
Other information: -Lots of commands for each rank (besides donators) -Shops replace GE due to the GE bug. But Ge is still in game if wanted. -Home is Mos Le Harmless. -Few Custom Items -Prestige system (sorted shops) -Custom Clothes Changer -Custom Clothes Colour Changer -Full Summoning obelisk -Auto Voting was removed due to the method. (GTL VOTE) -Custom emote commands -Dicing (donator+ for rank)
-Still Bieng Fix
-Vote System -VPS -Forums -Searching For active staff & Members first time be cute with me
[img]http://i60.tinypic.com/2n22qrs.png[/img] ;D :| :o :o :o :o :o :o
